solution: Ensure that the contract ID provided exists in the ICI system and is correctly formatted.
Verify that all required fields and valid data are provided. Check for any mandatory templates or workflows.
Ensure that the approvers have the necessary permissions and that the contract complies with approval policies.
Check the electronic signature process and ensure all signatories are correctly set up and authorized.
Verify the renewal settings and ensure that the alert configurations are correctly set up.
Ensure that the contract exists and that you have the necessary permissions to access it.
Review the compliance requirements and ensure the contract meets all regulatory and internal standards.
Check the risk assessment criteria and ensure that all necessary data is provided for the evaluation.
Ensure that the required contract template is available in the ICI system and correctly configured.
Verify the integration settings with external systems and ensure data mapping is correctly configured.
Check the role-based access control settings and ensure that the user has the necessary permissions.
Ensure that the clauses exist in the ICI clause library and are correctly referenced in the contract.
Verify that the contract status transition is valid according to the defined workflow rules.
Check for any validation errors and ensure that the contract data is correctly formatted and complete.
Ensure that all mandatory metadata fields are filled out with valid data.
Review the workflow configuration and ensure that all steps are correctly defined and executed in sequence.
Re-upload the contract document ensuring it is in the correct format and free from corruption.
Verify that the AI models are correctly trained and that the contract text is clear and unambiguous.
Check the report parameters and ensure that the necessary data is available and correctly configured.
Verify the notification settings and ensure that the email server configuration is correct and active.
